td.p:
To use POEM you need to have write access to your database.
POEM gathers information about your database and stores that information in the following tables, which it creates:
tableinfo
columninfo
tablecategory
group
user
POEM is very well behaved and leaves no other trace of its interaction, but you may feel that creating tables in a databse is too much.
A CourteousPoemDatabase deletes these tables during shutdown. You may have used POEM to modify the databse, but you do not need to perform the cleanup step of removing temporary the metadata tables.
